entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 2:28AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Chinook Warming Pattern This Weekend Through Early Next Week... After several weeks of a cold and snowy pattern, a chinook warming pattern will bring substantially warmer air into the southern Interior from the Alaska Range up across the Tanana Valley. Temperatures in the area are expected to rise into the 30s, and possibly even warmer near the Alaska Range. South winds
entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
